titles.title: To authorize a foreign-built launch barge to transport an offshore drilling platform jacket in the coastwise trade of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. Authorizes a named foreign vessel to transport an offshore drilling platform jacket from Arkansas Pass, Texas, to Viosca Knoll 989 on the Outer Continental Shelf.
